import React from "react"; import { FormattedMessage } from 'react-intl' const achievementsContent = [ { title: "1", subTitle1: "research paper", subTitle2: "published" }, { title: "6", subTitle1: "Certification", subTitle2: "Lean Six Sigma, ISTQB, Scrum, Python" }, // { title: "1", subTitle1: "Startup", subTitle2: "Appstasy" }, { title: "1", subTitle1: "Mobile app", subTitle2: "Hotfocus" }, ]; const Achievements = () => { return (

{achievementsContent[0].title}

{achievementsContent[1].title}

); }; export default Achievements;
